mapper.select: SELECT p.product_no, p.name, p.brand, p.price, pd.product_detail_no, pd.color_code, pd.img1, c.psize, c.amount FROM product p, product_detail pd, cart c WHERE c.product_detail_no = pd.product_detail_no AND p.product_no = pd.product_no AND c.member_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (member_id, product_detail_no, psize, amount) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productDetailNo}, #{psize}, #{amount})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE product_detail_no = #{productDetailNo} and psize = #{psize} and member_id = #{memberId}
